title: Waldorf77
author: Waldorf77
content: It's pivotal point and we are choosen ones it will be not easy it will be hard for everybodyWe are lucky ones we can change society now the next pivotal year will after 120 years.So we make moves now big changes in Everything so next 120 years will be stable life.The pivotal points Are after every 2nd generation the third generation will have hardest but the first 2 before 3rd they gona have smooth ride.Off course wealth will change the hands now and will stay in stable hands until the next 120 years.
